issue.title: [Go] Add LICENSE additions for Go subproject
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Arrow Go codebase contains code from the Go project. This needs to be mentioned in the main LICENSE.txt
